text:
e="preserve">Martha Phindile Mmola (died 18 July 2020) was a South Africa politician. He was a permanment delegate to the National Council of Provinces from 2019 to her death in 2020. She was in the National Assembly of South Africa from 2014 to 2019. Mmola was a member of the African National Congress.
From 20 June 2014 to 7 May 2019, she was a member of the Portfolio Committee on Police.
On 18 July 2020, Mmola died from COVID-19.
